message:
Scorching heat was no deterrent for so many people to join the rally in Davangere. Gratitude to all who joined us.

Explained how Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana, Soil Health Cards, e-Nam are bringing about a positive difference in lives of farmers. We attach great importance to welfare of sugarcane farmers. Highlighted some steps taken in this regard. 

Our Govt. is strengthening systems & eliminating role of middlemen. We want the poor to lead a life of dignity. 
http://nm-4.com/7w4p
